content:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Presidio to Richmond District: 7.
Presidio to North Beach: 18.
Presidio to Financial District: 23.
Presidio to Golden Gate Park: 12.
Presidio to Union Square: 22.
Richmond District to Presidio: 7.
Richmond District to North Beach: 17.
Richmond District to Financial District: 22.
Richmond District to Golden Gate Park: 9.
Richmond District to Union Square: 21.
North Beach to Presidio: 17.
North Beach to Richmond District: 18.
North Beach to Financial District: 8.
North Beach to Golden Gate Park: 22.
North Beach to Union Square: 7.
Financial District to Presidio: 22.
Financial District to Richmond District: 21.
Financial District to North Beach: 7.
Financial District to Golden Gate Park: 23.
Financial District to Union Square: 9.
Golden Gate Park to Presidio: 11.
Golden Gate Park to Richmond District: 7.
Golden Gate Park to North Beach: 24.
Golden Gate Park to Financial District: 26.
Golden Gate Park to Union Square: 22.
Union Square to Presidio: 24.
Union Square to Richmond District: 20.
Union Square to North Beach: 10.
Union Square to Financial District: 9.
Union Square to Golden Gate Park: 22.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Presidio at 9:00AM. Jason will be at Richmond District from 1:00PM to 8:45PM. You'd like to meet Jason for a minimum of 90 minutes. Melissa will be at North Beach from 6:45PM to 8:15PM. You'd like to meet Melissa for a minimum of 45 minutes. Brian will be at Financial District from 9:45AM to 9:45PM. You'd like to meet Brian for a minimum of 15 minutes. Elizabeth will be at Golden Gate Park from 8:45AM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Elizabeth for a minimum of 105 minutes. Laura will be at Union Square from 2:15PM to 7:30PM. You'd like to meet Laura for a minimum of 75 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.

SOLUTION:
The optimal schedule meets all five friends while respecting the minimum meeting times and availability constraints. The itinerary minimizes waiting time and travel time by grouping meetings geographically: starting with Elizabeth at Golden Gate Park (close to Presidio), then Brian at Financial District, followed by Jason at Richmond District (after his availability starts), Laura at Union Square, and finally Melissa at North Beach during her availability window. Travel times are accounted for between meetings, but only meeting actions are included in the JSON output.

The final meeting schedule is as follows:
- Meet Elizabeth from 9:12 AM to 10:57 AM (105 minutes at Golden Gate Park).
- Meet Brian from 11:23 AM to 11:38 AM (15 minutes at Financial District).
- Meet Jason from 1:00 PM to 2:30 PM (90 minutes at Richmond District).
- Meet Laura from 2:51 PM to 4:06 PM (75 minutes at Union Square).
- Meet Melissa from 6:45 PM to 7:30 PM (45 minutes at North Beach).

This schedule ensures all minimum meeting times are met with minimal waiting:
- After starting at Presidio at 9:00 AM, travel to Golden Gate Park (12 minutes) allows meeting Elizabeth to start at 9:12 AM.
- Travel from Golden Gate Park to Financial District (26 minutes) allows meeting Brian to start at 11:23 AM.
- Travel from Financial District to Richmond District (21 minutes) results in arrival at 11:59 AM, with a short wait until Jason's availability at 1:00 PM.
- Travel from Richmond District to Union Square (21 minutes) allows meeting Laura to start at 2:51 PM (within her availability from 2:15 PM).
- Travel from Union Square to North Beach (10 minutes) is timed to arrive at 6:45 PM for Melissa's availability.

All constraints are satisfied, and all friends are met.

{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "Elizabeth", "start_time": "09:12 AM", "end_time": "10:57 AM"}, {"action": "meet", "person": "Brian", "start_time": "11:23 AM", "end_time": "11:38 AM"}, {"action": "meet", "person": "Jason", "start_time": "01:00 PM", "end_time": "02:30 PM"}, {"action": "meet", "person": "Laura", "start_time": "02:51 PM", "end_time": "04:06 PM"}, {"action": "meet", "person": "Melissa", "start_time": "06:45 PM", "end_time": "07:30 PM"}]}
